question: [Challenge] Deutsch: Teile which category has the highest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.

qas.question: [Challenge] Deutsch: Teile which category has the highest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.
[Explain] Francais: Donnez which category has the lowest bar depuis le diagramme en barres.
[Study] English: Tell what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars from the bar chart.
